### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

paper <- tibble(
  
  title = c(
    "<i>Smart Literature Review: A Practical Topic Modelling Approach to Exploratory Literature Review</i>",
    "<i>Topic Modeling in R with tidytext and textmineR Package (Latent Dirichlet Allocation)</i>",
    "<i>Short Text Topic Modeling: Article Titles & Taglines</i>",
    "<i>A Brief Introduction to LDAShiny</i>",
    "<i>Lexical Analysis of Textual Data</i>"
    ),
  
  Source = c(
    "Asmussenm C.B. & Moller, C. (2019)",
    "Christian (2020)",
    "Hardaway (2022)",
    "Maestre, J.D.L.H., Fernández-Gómez, M.J., & Mendes, S (2020)",
    "Paice, C.D. (2009)"
    ),
  
  Arrow = c(
    "internal",
    "external",
    "external",
    "external",
    "internal"
    ),
  
  Icon = c(
    "pdf",
    "webpage",
    "webpage",
    "webpage",
    "pdf"
    ),
  
  Site = c(
    "https://doi.org/10.1186/s40537-019-0255-7",
    "https://medium.com/swlh/topic-modeling-in-r-with-tidytext-and-textminer-package-latent-dirichlet-allocation-764f4483be73",
    "https://rpubs.com/jmhardaw/eci588-final-project",
    "https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/LDAShiny/vignettes/A_brief_introduction_to_LDAShiny.html",
    "https://doi.org/10.1007/978-0-387-39940-9_941"
    ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
paper %>%
  mutate(Icon = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "library") ~ '<img src="/logos/library-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "webpage") ~ '<img src="/logos/webpage-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Arrow = case_when(
    str_detect(`Arrow`, "external") ~ '<div style="font-size: 0.5rem;"><i class="fa fa-external-link fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color:#559977"></i></div>',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Site = na_if(Site, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site," target='_blank'>",Icon,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ "Please check this week's download"
    )
  ) %>%
  select(-Icon, -Site, -Arrow) %>% 
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", "Citation", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "40em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:nrow(paper), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent")
```
</center>
